meanings.definition: The muscles at the back of the upper arm.
meanings.sent1: He flexed his tricepses to show his strength.
meanings.sent2: Her tricepses were sore after lifting weights.
meanings.sent3: The tricepses decided to take a break from all the heavy lifting.
meanings.sent4: His tricepses were like steel cables, powering his punches.
meanings.sent5: The tricepses bulged with every movement, sculpted from hard work.

meanings.sent1: The anatomy book mentioned the tricepses as important muscles.
meanings.sent2: In the gym, they focused on strengthening their tricepses.
meanings.sent3: The tricepses gathered for a group workout session.
meanings.sent4: Her tricepses were a symbol of her dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The tricepses were like pistons, driving her arm movements effortlessly.
